titleStmt.title: The vanitie of the present churches, and vncertainty of their preaching, discovered. Wherein the pretended immediate teaching of the spirit, is denyed, and the all-sufficiency of the Scriptures teaching, is maintained. With, a new and true method of reading thereof, for the peace of the mind, and rule of life.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Clows, and are to be sold in Cornhill, and Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Walwyn. Cf. McMichael and Taft, The writings of William Walwyn, 308-9.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 12 1648"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
